Our Services

From dyno testing to trackside support – comprehensive suspension and chassis services for every level of motorsport.

01

Suspension Setup & Development

Your car is unique. Your setup should be too.

Whether you're preparing for track days, hillclimbs, or simply want your road car to handle better, we develop suspension setups tailored to your specific needs, driving style, and application.

What's Included:

  • Complete damper assessment and dyno testing
  • Spring rate selection and matching
  • Ride height optimisation
  • Corner weight adjustment
  • Data-driven development using AiM equipment
  • Before/after comparison testing

We work with all major damper brands including Penske, Nitron, Ohlins, and Quantum. Even if you didn't buy your dampers from us, we can service and optimise them.

Track Setup

Race-focused configurations for maximum grip and predictable handling at the limit.

Road Setup

Comfortable, controlled, and engaging. Performance without compromise on daily usability.

Hillclimb Specific

Optimised for the unique demands of hillclimb – fast direction changes and varied surfaces.

02

Custom Valving

Linear Valving

Consistent damping force throughout the stroke. Ideal for smooth surfaces and predictable handling.

Digressive Valving

Better compliance over bumps while maintaining high-speed control. Our recommended option for most Caterhams.

Progressive Valving

Increasing damping with speed. Excellent for cars that see both road and track use.

We're not all the same. Why should your suspension be?

Suspension feel is subjective. What works for one driver may not suit another. Custom valving allows us to tune your dampers specifically for YOU – your weight, your driving style, your preferences.

Every set of dampers we valve is built to order. We'll discuss your requirements, build the shim stacks to suit, then dyno test to verify performance before shipping.

The Process:

  • Consultation on your requirements and driving style
  • Piston and shim stack specification
  • Assembly with fresh oil and seals
  • Dyno testing and verification
  • Setup recommendations and adjustment guide

We particularly recommend digressive front pistons for Caterhams – they transform turn-in feel and ride quality over larger bumps.

03

Chassis Engineering

Suspension doesn't exist in isolation.

A properly set up car is more than just good dampers. It's about how every component works together – geometry, springs, anti-roll bars, ride height, and weight distribution all contribute to the complete package.

Our chassis engineering service takes a holistic approach. We assess your car as a complete system and develop solutions that address the whole picture, not just individual components.

Chassis Services:

  • Geometry measurement and optimisation
  • Corner weighting and balance adjustment
  • Anti-roll bar selection and setup
  • Ride height calibration
  • Bump steer correction
  • Caster, camber, and toe optimisation
Complete Assessment

Full chassis evaluation with detailed report on current state and recommended improvements.

Setup Day

Bring your car in for a full day of chassis setup and optimisation. Leave with a transformed driving experience.

Development Programme

Ongoing chassis development with iterative testing and refinement for serious competitors.

04

Track & Event Support

Trackside Setup

Real-time adjustments based on track conditions and your feedback between sessions.

Data Analysis

Review your logged data to identify setup improvements and driving optimisations.

Technical Support

Problem solving and emergency repairs. We've seen most issues before and know how to fix them quickly.

Sometimes you need help at the track.

Whether you're competing in a championship or enjoying a track day, having experienced technical support can make the difference between a frustrating weekend and a successful one.

We offer trackside support at events across the UK. This includes setup consultation, real-time adjustments between sessions, data review, and technical problem solving.

Available For:

  • Caterham Championship support
  • Hillclimb and sprint events
  • Track days and testing sessions
  • Race weekend support

Contact us to discuss your event requirements. We're particularly well set up for Caterham competitors but welcome enquiries for other lightweight sports cars.

Ready to Improve Your Setup?

Get in touch to discuss your requirements. No obligation – just a conversation about what you're looking to achieve.
